channel.title: CVE Feed for Hammock Corporation -- AssetView for MacOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hammock Corporation -- AssetView for MacOS

item.title: CVE-2017-2240|2024-08-05T13:48:05.058Z -- hammock%20corporation -- assetview%20for%20macos
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in AssetView for MacOS Ver.9.2.0 and earlier versions allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via "File Transfer Web Service".

item.title: CVE-2017-2241|2024-08-05T13:48:04.260Z -- hammock%20corporation -- assetview%20for%20macos
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the AssetView for MacOS Ver.9.2.0 and earlier versions allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via "File Transfer Web Service".
